The video was viewed more than 24: 000 times and shared 5,600 times after it was published on Facebook on August 30, 2020.
The video shows a close: up of a man's face inside a casket, which is claimed to be the face of Saddam Hussein.
The post: s Hindi caption translates to English as stating that Saddam Hussein's face was intact and glowing even after 12 years when his body was exhumed to move his grave.
A longer version of the video titled: Saddam Hussein Funeral and Burial Ceremony" was found on YouTube, published on January 6, 2007, indicating that the video is not recent and does not show Saddam Hussein's body 12 years after his death.
